description: Su Nan travelled to the world of game. He entered in the soul of a person, who is also known as Su Nan. The person is very poor and lazy. In his previous life he had house, clothes and caring parents, but in this life he had nothing. He was addicted to play computer games, but did not have money to buy a computer so he plays games in cafe. To win the game he can do anything. To become stronger, he can eliminate everyone.>
